short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PineTab helps you organize your tabs and save them for later by a single click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PineTab is an intuitive Chrome extension designed to streamline your browsing experience by efficiently organizing your tabs. It provides a user-friendly interface to view, select, and manage tabs across all open windows. With a simple drag or click, users can select multiple tabs for closure or save them as bookmarks in a specific directory.

PineTab offers customization options to further enhance your browsing experience. You can choose to save tabs directly under a designated folder or as part of a subfolder.

Designed with simplicity and user experience in mind, PineTab turns tab management into a smooth and organized process. Whether you're a heavy browser with dozens of tabs or someone who prefers a minimalistic workspace, PineTab has got you covered. Make the most of your digital space with PineTab!

How to use?: https://admghng.blogspot.com/2023/07/how-to-use-pinetab.html

Version 1.0.2 Release Notes (2024.06.02) 

1. User Experience Improvements:
- Enhanced the design of the tab close button for better visibility and usability.
- Improved hover effect on the selected window to provide clearer feedback.

2. Bug Fixes:
- Fixed 'X' Concatenation Issue: Resolved the issue where an 'X' was being concatenated to the tab title when closing multiple tabs.
- Handled Unknown Favicon Image URL: Implemented a solution to deal with tabs that have an unknown favicon URL, ensuring the display of a default logo instead.

3. New Features:
- Double-Click to Move to Tab/Window: Added a feature that allows users to move directly to a clicked tab or window by double-clicking on it, enhancing navigation efficiency.

Version 1.0.3, 1.0.4 Release Notes (2024.07.05)
1. Scrolling with mouse wheel enabled on tab list
2. Small UX updates:
- Help / Credits modal added
- Setting modal improved
3. Fix bugs (1.0.4)

Version 1.0.5 Release Notes (2024.10.04)
1. Performance Boost: Refactored and optimized the code base to ensure faster and smoother tab management. PineTab now runs more efficiently, especially when managing large numbers of tabs across multiple windows.
 
We wish that you'll enjoy better your web environment with PineTab ! üòÅ
